NewsArticle.Title: 5 NEW Daily Hunting Quest
NewsArticle.Content: Five New Daily Hunting Quest We have added 5 additional daily hunting quests. Players will be randomly given a quest to hunt monsters in specific areas. All 5 hunting quests can be done simultaneously including the original Daily Kill Quest. Experience will be rewarded upon each completion. NPCs to visit: Lalerid - Nobis Codus - Shinewoods Fallen Solider - Chaos Fallen Solider -Chadul Raylan - Mt Giragan Error & DA Team
